title: General Bonehelm

properties.name: description
properties.value: General Bonehelm is a legend amongst the Dorgeshuun, as he rode into the Dorgeshuun Civil War on a giant frog. He was the leader of the Dorgeshuun tribe until a republican government was formed, resulting in a civil war between the tribal and republican factions. After a battle, the general was banished from the city, and he tunnelled into the nearby caves. His army was defeated when his caves collapsed.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:General Bonehelm

General Bonehelm is a legend amongst the Dorgeshuun, as he rode into the Dorgeshuun Civil War on a giant frog. He was the leader of the Dorgeshuun tribe until a republican government was formed, resulting in a civil war between the tribal and republican factions. After a battle, the general was banished from the city, and he tunnelled into the nearby caves. His army was defeated when his caves collapsed.
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
'''General Bonehelm''' is a legend amongst the [[Dorgeshuun]], as he rode into the [[Dorgeshuun Civil War]] on a [[giant frog]]. He was the leader of the Dorgeshuun tribe until a republican government was formed, resulting in a [[Dorgeshuun Civil War|civil war]] between the tribal and republican factions. After a battle, the general was banished from the city, and he tunnelled into the nearby caves. His army was defeated when his caves collapsed.

[[Category:Deceased characters]]
[[Category:Characters that do not appear in-game]]
